item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls character trailer – Ikkaku Madarame
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/bleach-rebirth-of-souls-character-trailer-ikkaku-madarame

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft have released a new character trailer for fighting action game Bleach: Rebirth of Souls highlighting playable fighter Ikkaku Madarame.

According to his description, Madarame is the luckiest man in the Soul Society, capable of overcoming superior opponents in close range combat.

Bleach: Rebirth of Souls is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam on March 21.

item.title: TOKYO PSYCHODEMIC and KAMiBAKO: Mythology of Cube PS5 physical editions launch in Q2 2025 in the Americas
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/tokyo-psychodemic-and-kamibako-mythology-of-cube-ps5-physical-editions-launch-in-q2-2025-in-the-americas

  • PS5

Distributed by PM Studios.

PM Studios will distribute physical editions of Gravity Game Arise-developed forensics investigation simulation game TOKYO PSYCHODEMIC and RPG KAMiBAKO: Mythology of Cube for PlayStation 5 in Q2 2025 in North and South America, the company announced.

“We’re incredibly excited to bring Gravity’s diverse and engaging catalog of games to a wider audience in the Americas through physical releases,” said PM Studios CEO Michael Yum in a press release. “Gravity has a proven track record of creating captivating gaming experiences, and we’re confident that players in our territories will embrace their titles. We believe this collaboration will be mutually beneficial, allowing us to expand our reach while providing Gravity with the distribution expertise and market knowledge PM Studios has cultivated over the years. We look forward to a long and successful partnership.”

Here is an overview of each game, via PM Studios:

TOKYO PSYCHODEMIC

TOKYO PSYCHODEMIC A new viral outbreak has forced Tokyo into an extended lockdown. After a three year epidemic, life seems to have returned to normal until a string of paranormal incidents occur. Players must solve these cases and confront the supernatural through the analyzing of evidence and consulting with specialists in this simulation game which blends 2D illustrations with real-life visuals.

KAMiBAKO: Mythology of Cube

KAMiBAKO: Mythology of Cube A blend of puzzle-solving, role-playing, crafting and combat, KAMiBAKO: Mythology of Cube puts players in the role of the “Restorer” who must repair the land through puzzles, and rid the world of darkness by defeating dangerous monsters.

Both TOKYO PSYCHODEMIC and KAMiBAKO: Mythology of Cube are available now digitally for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam. In Japan, physical editions of both games are available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch.
